article_title: Kentucky GOP gubernatorial candidates pledge to be unified even as divides grow sharper
article_text: With just more than three weeks until the primary, Republican officials are trying to ensure that the party will emerge from an increasingly contentious primary unified to take on Democratic state Attorney General Jack Conway even as the candidates step up the volume and intensity of attacks on each other.
